page.title: 03Miserden Estate Farming 1
page.content: Miserden Estate covers by far the greatest area of land in our block,some{2,400 acres.}There are{330 {Friesian milking cows,300 dairy follow {up,200 beef cattle and 1500 breeding {ewes. Wheat}is grown either for milling or feed.{Barley}is used for feed or for sale and some of the spring barley is used for malting.{Oil {seed rape}is also grown. The{Common market regulations}have meant a reduction in the amount of milk that can be produced. The Estate is made up of{ten farms: Henley,Park,Gaskells,Lypiatt, Jackbarrow, Manor,Townsend,Stonyhill, Caudle Green and Wishanger. The average size of a field is 30 acres which is 3 times bigger than in the past. {( .....contd)
